meanings.definition: The quality of being stylish or attractive.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit had a touch of spiffinesses that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent2: The spiffinesses of the new car design impressed the customers.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted around with spiffinesses, feeling like a fashion model.
meanings.sent4: The spiffinesses of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The spiffinesses of the diamond ring sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The act of making something neat or tidy.
meanings.sent1: She took great care in the spiffinesses of her room before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent2: The spiffinesses of his desk organization made it easy to find things.
meanings.sent3: The spiffinesses of folding laundry was oddly satisfying to her.
meanings.sent4: His spiffinesses of arranging books on the shelf was like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The spiffinesses of the freshly mowed lawn made the whole yard look pristine.
